name: Parking Spaces [LD42]
description:
I was on holiday for Ludum Dare 42 so I wasn't able to dedicate much time this time around but this is what I came up with in about 8 hours.

Instructions

  • You control car with red outline.
  • Use A/D or Left/Right Arrows to steer.
  • Use W or Up Arrow to "commit" to a parking space (you can no longer control that car)
  • Don't let the car crash into one another or into a barricade.

Hints: Car will pick suitable space itself (front / back row) but make sure that the car in front intends to park longer than the one behind. The timer on the car states how long it will park. Make sure to allow cars with trailer/caravan and lorries to occupy two spaces or they will crash!

Let's Play Competition - August 2018

  • Post your YouTube "Let's Play" video when you set your highscore as a comment on this page.
  • Prize: The winner at the end of August wins $50 (runner up $20 prize for funniest attempt)
  • Rules: The complete play session must be included in the video. You must include a link to this page in the description of the video. You must have a PayPal account.  Video must be uploaded before 00:00 CET 1st September 2018. The video where the highest score is set wins. If bugs are exploited the submission may be disqualified. There will be a $20 prize to the funnies submission regardless of score. I reserve the right to select winning contributions and to modify the rules if I've made a typo/mistake. You can use the WebGL or the Windows downloadable version. You can submit as many videos as you want if someone beats your score! Webcam, microphone and commentary is encouraged but not required. Winner will be announced on this page.

What's your highscore??
